General.Name: Shanghai Baosight Software Co Ltd B
General.Description: Shanghai Baosight Software Co.,Ltd. provides industrial solutions in China. It offers information solutions, including manufacturing execution, integrated process quality management, and energy management systems; smart storage systems, such as crane location tracking and unmanned automatic crane systems; and electromechanical equipment comprising industrial robots, bell-type furnaces, and surface inspection devices, as well as automation solutions consisting of whole metallurgical and cold rolling processes. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
General.Address: Pilot Free Trade Zone, Shanghai, China, 201203
